title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Strawberry Mountain Trail, Washington
content:
Photo submitted by Jared Vigil, “Andrew Ford finishing a hike a bike section on Strawberry Ridge with Mt. St. Helens in the background. Near Randle, WA.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Strawberry Mountain Trail, Washington appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
